title: An Intro to Posts
content:
The new posts tab you're seeing is specifically for me directly communicating with the user.
Most things I will post are just updates to the biome data or aura data, but sometimes I'll post important information, so keep an eye out on this tab!
You'll also receive a notification whenever a new post is sent out. But don't worry, these notifications are NOT intrusive and wont be that annoying.

Anyways, this post is quite old since this is when I first made the system. Have fun and thanks for using Oyster Detector!

title: FastFlags are completely patched.
content:
Roblox has just recently completely patched out any and all FastFlag bypasses (which only included IxpSettings, but who cares), which means that Jester, Mari, and Eden detection now will completely not work at all.
Once/If the Sol's RNG developers add logging for these NPCs, Oyster Detector will receive a quick patch/update to use this new system.
But for now, you can no longer detect Merchants/NPCs.

title: Feature Suggestions
content:
With development slowing down and most features already in the app, I am starting to wonder what more I could add to the app.

If you have an idea for a feature to add to Oyster, then I'd gladly hear you out, as long as it follows the following guidelines:
- Does not interact with elements on screen, Oyster is designed to run solely in the background without interupting your gameplay.
- Does not already exist in the app, please look through all the features of the app already and see if your great idea exists already or not.
- Is not a troll suggestion, please don't try to troll and suggest stupid things, you'll just be ignored and you'll have wasted your time.

Please go into depth on how your feature would work, as the more information the better.
Also note that giving a feature suggestion will not get you in the Credits tab, but it might land you a spot in the Help Window for the Credits tab.

If you have some ideas, feel free to hit me up on Discord (@vex.rng). I am in a lot of biome hunting servers and am in maincord, so you can find me in the member list there, DMs are always open!
